sub_title: Regulatory Manager Europe | Diversey Europe Operations BV
summary:
Professional with 10 years of experience in Registration and Regulatory Affairs in the area of pesticides and biocides, supporting and managing several projects throughout the years in both LATAM and EU regions. Broad experience with working with plant protection legislation in Brazil and with biocides (pre-BPR and BPR registrations) within the EU.

Good time and priorities management, team-player, pro-active, pragmatic and works well under tight deadlines. Has the ability of working with different demands simultaneously.

Double citizenship: Brazilian/Portuguese

awards.title: Recognition - State Registration
awards.description: Recognition for the State Registration of Vessarya, covering the preparation of dossiers, submission if the processes, FUP and approval of all states within the 10% timeline.
